title: Farming/Patch locations

properties.name: description
properties.value: Players can grow a single spirit tree at level 83 Farming, two at level 91, and an unlimited amount at level 99.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Farming/Patch locations

Spirit tree patches[edit | edit source]

Main article: Spirit Tree (Farming)

Players can grow a single spirit tree at level 83 Farming, two at level 91, and an unlimited amount at level 99.

Location Nearby activities Closest teleport Image
South-east Etceteria
Gardener: Yulf Squecks
  • Advisor Ghrim (Managing Miscellania)
  • Sea snakes
  • Bush patch
  • Ship to Rellekka
  • Ring of wealth to Miscellania
  • Fairy ring code cip
  • Enchanted lyre/Fremennik sea boots teleport, then run north to the boat
  • Rellekka house portal: Teleport to House spell or redirected house tab, then run north to the boat
East of Port Sarim
Gardener: Frizzy Skernip
  • Ship to Void Knights' Outpost
  • Ship to Entrana
    • Law Altar at Entrana
  • Ship to Great Kourend
  • Charter ship
  • Port Sarim and Rimmington shops
  • Draynor Village farming patches
  • Explorer's ring 2 or higher
  • Amulet of glory to Draynor Village
  • Rimmington house portal: Teleport to House spell or redirected house tab
North of Brimhaven
Gardener: Praistan Ebola
  • Fruit tree patch
  • Brimhaven Dungeon
  • Brimhaven Agility Arena
  • Calquat tree patch
  • Charter ship (Port Sarim spot is slightly better)
  • Brimhaven house portal: Teleport to House spell or redirected house tab
  • Karamja gloves 3/4 to Shilo Village, then take the cart
  • Teleport to Ardougne and take a boat ride to Brimhaven

Gardener: Lammy Langle
  • Watson

  • Tithe Farm Grouping teleport
Northern section of the Farming Guild
(85 Farming required)
Gardener: Latlink Fastbell
  • Farming Guild patches
  • Skills necklace to Farming Guild
  • Farming cape teleport
  • Fairy ring code CIR, then run south-west

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
28 April 2016
(update | poll)

It is now possible to add compost or supercompost to any farming patch during any growth stage of a crop.

8 October 2015
(update)

Left-click pruning farming patches now checks for held magic secateurs.

28 May 2015
(update)

The tool leprechaun at the farming patch just south of Falador has been moved slightly to be closer to where players are when using the farming patch.

16 April 2015
(update)

Farmers will no longer protect Poison Ivy bushes, as they are immune to disease.

5 March 2015
(update | poll)

• You now receive 10% more experience from the Falador farming patch if you have completed the Falador Medium Diary.

• The tree patch in Falador will no longer become diseased if you have completed the Falador Elite Diary.

• You now receive increased yields from the Catherby herb patch for the completion of Kandarin Diaries:

  • 5% more for the medium diary.
  • 10% more for the hard diary.
  • 15% more for the elite diary.
18 September 2014
(update | poll)

The cactus patch found in Al-Kharid now has an accompanying NPC to protect your cactus for the small cost of 6 cadava berries.
